page.title: 10HOLIDAY FACILITIES
page.content: {Tourism}is catered for in a number of ways.{Accomodation}is provided by four hotels, two guest houses, two camping and caravan sites, a youth hostel and a number of houses offering bed and breakfast accomodation. The available{activities}are dominated by those associated with the beach and the sea.{Swimming and bathing}from the beach and harbour,{fishing, sailing, {canoeing, safari-skiing and {skin-diving}are popular. Equipment for these activities is available for hire. A shop is on hand which sells watersport equipment, diving air, etc. {Boat trips}are available either for the pleasure of the trip or for boat fishing. The popular sport of{wind- {surfing}is also available, with training facilities provided if required. The wind-surfing school is based at the Youth Hostel.
